name: Ippy's World
description:
Ippy wakes up on Earth, and had alot of fun exploring and finding out new things that Earth has to offer.  But something happened, Ippy finds a black explosion on the sky, as The Corrupt was born. The Corrupt is trying to destroy Earth. Did Ippy save the world? You'll know as you play through the game.

If you don't know, you can load progress. Press Shift + Ctrl + Alt + Enter to open a debug menu. In the text edit box, you can type numbers, and that's how many doors will be opened. You can just go to the end, or load where you left off, your choice.

Everything in the project is made by me.

This game has no pause, just to let you know.

Controls: Asd, or Arrow keys to move. Spacebar or W to jump. Z or / to shoot snowballs once loaded. S or Down arrow key to enter a door.
